results.title: Animated geometry: the angle at the circumference
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Animated Geometry”.
Related to the basic theorem concerning the angle at the circumference. Two cases are studied, that of the angle having a diameter at one side and that angel including the centre between its sides. Series is: Animated geometry.

results.title: The Laundry
results.creator_credit: Lesley Dyer, Alex Chomicz and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
A big man covered in blood enters a basement laundry. Is the threat in her mind or it real? And which is more scary…?
Cast features Rhonnda Findleton and Domenic Galati.

results.title: Inja = Dog
results.creator_credit: Joe Weatherstone, Steve Pasvolsky and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
South Africa, 1980s. Using a young Xhosa boy as a pawn, a farmer teaches his puppy to be white man’s best friend. Ten years later, both their lives hang in the balance at the mercy of the dog.
Filmed on location at Bien Donne Werf, Franschhoek Valley, South Africa.
In English/Afrikaans/Xhosa with English subtitles

results.title: Harvey
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Rachel Roberts, Priscilla Collins and Peter McDonald
results.brief_description: A dark tale of obsession and loneliness about a man searching for physical and emotional completeness. It is only when he thinks he has achieved this goal through the unwilling coalescence of his neighbour that he begins to understand the painful, irresolvable nature of his obsession. Stars Nicholas Hope as Harvey and Lisa Angove as Lily.

results.title: Flying over mother
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Melanie Coombs and Michael James Rowland
results.brief_description:
1. Vladimir is growing up on an isolated farm somewhere on the Russian Steppes. He has been brought up on his mother’s stories of all the dangers that lie in wait for boys who misbehave and he is trying - not very successfully - to overcome his fears. But one day something happens that will change the direction of his life.
  2. Vladimir has finally reached his goal - he has trained as a cosmonaut and is circling the earth. But unfortunately his capsule has malfunctioned and things don’t look so good for him…

results.title: Audacious
results.creator_credit: Fiona Tuomy, Samantha Lang and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
Stella, a young woman bored with her husband’s bedroom behaviour, embarks on a daring journey to the other side of sexual satisfaction.
Cast features Dee Smart as Stella and John Polson as Tom.

results.title: The Space between the door and the floor
results.creator_credit: Andrew O'Sullivan, Pauline Chan and AFTRS
results.brief_description: He sits alone in his office waiting for the girl of his dreams. When she comes, he will see her approach in the space between the bottom of the door and the floor. He lights a cigarette and waits … In the space between the door and the floor there lies a sliver of light in a dark world of fantasy and desire.

results.title: Restoration
results.creator_credit: Christine Hansen, Kate Riedl, Cordelia Beresford and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
On a remote New South Wales property in 1912, the image was captured of a young woman who worked as a maid. Her calm gaze hid passions that emerged to subvert her fate. In Restoration fragments of memory combine in photography and dance to retell her story.
Narelle Benjamin (the maid) and Solon Ulbrich (the photographer) also choreographed the dance sequences.
